data.text: @PekalaLaw Get hit with the damn ads everyday .

@PekalaLaw ICYMI those strip mall gambling locations like Betty’s 🍸 and VFW Slots remained open during the pandemic because the states cut is 30%. Way more than the “Big guy’s” cut. https://t.co/RegnGRUmoy

@PekalaLaw How many lives have been or will be destroyed. How many families have been or will be destroyed. This is just another potential addiction for a corrupts state to push to it’s citizens for their piece of the action. They are a literal organized crime family. #IllinoisDemocratMafia
@PekalaLaw My way is the winner. It’s always my money.
